    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/2187</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/2187</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Els rius de Catalunya</string>
            <string language="en">Catalan rivers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Katalanische Flüsse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Fleuves catalans</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Rios catalan</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Fiumi catalan</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καταλανικοί ποταμοί</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Unitat didàctica sobre els rius catalans per a cicle mitjà de primària. Consta de: guia didàctica, activitats d'avaluació i d'aprenentatge sobre conceptes relacionats amb els rius en general (els tres cursos dels rius...), la localització dels rius en un mapa de Catalunya i característiques dels principals rius catalans (lloc de naixement, afluents més importants...).</string>
            <string language="en">Teaching unit on Catalan rivers for 8- to 10-year-olds. It includes a teacher's guide, activities for assessment and for learning basic concepts of rivers (the three parts of its course, etc.), locating the rivers on a map of Catalonia, and the characteristics of the main Catalan rivers (source, major tributaries, etc.)</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">geografia</string>
            <string language="en">geography</string>
            <string language="es">geografía</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">fenomen geomorfològic</string>
            <string language="en">geomorphologic phenomenon</string>
            <string language="es">fenómeno geomorfológico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">fenomen natural</string>
            <string language="en">natural phenomenon</string>
            <string language="es">fenómeno natural</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">geografia regional</string>
            <string language="en">regional geography</string>
            <string language="es">geografía regional</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">topografia</string>
            <string language="en">topography</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Unterrichtende Maßeinheit auf katalanischen 
Flüssen für 8 zu 10-year-olds. Es schließt die Anleitung 
eines Lehrers, Aktivitäten für Einschätzung und für das Lernen der
Grundmodelle von Flüssen (die drei Teile seines Kurses, etc.) ein und
lokalisiert die Flüsse auf einer Karte von Katalonien und die 
Eigenschaften der katalanischen hauptsächlichflüsse (Quelle, 
Hauptsteuerbare, usw..)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Unité d'enseignement sur les fleuves catalans 
pour 8 à 10-year-olds. Il inclut le guide d'un professeur, 
activités pour l'évaluation et pour apprendre des concepts de base 
des fleuves (les trois parties de son cours, etc.), localisant les 
fleuves sur une carte de la Catalogne, et les caractéristiques des 
fleuves catalans principaux (source, tributaires principaux, etc...)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Unidade ensinando em rios catalan para 8- a 
10-year-olds. Inclui a guia de um professor, atividades para a 
avaliação e para aprender os conceitos básicos dos rios (as três 
partes de seus curso, etc.), encontrando os rios em um mapa de 
Catalonia, e as características dos rios catalan principais (fonte, 
tributários principais, etc..)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Unità d'istruzione sui fiumi catalan per 8 a 
10-year-olds. Include la guida dell'insegnante, attività per la
valutazione e per imparare i concetti di base dei fiumi (le tre parti 
del relativi corso, ecc.), individuanti i fiumi su un programma della 
Catalogna e le caratteristiche dei fiumi catalan principali (sorgente,
tributari importanti, ecc.)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μονάδα διδασκαλίας στους καταλανικούς ποταμούς για 8 
στο 10-έτος. Περιλαμβάνει τον οδηγό ενός δασκάλου, 
δραστηριότητες για την αξιολόγηση και για την εκμάθηση των βασικών
εννοιών των ποταμών (τα τρία μέρη της σειράς μαθημάτων του, 
κ.λπ.), εντοπίζοντας τους ποταμούς σε έναν χάρτη της Καταλωνίας, 
και τα χαρακτηριστικά των βασικών καταλανικών ποταμών (πηγή, 
σημαντικοί παραπόταμοι, κ.λπ....)</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geographie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">geomorphologisches Phänomen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">natürliches Phänomen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
